snippet: Anjelica Huston, who plays a Broadway producer on "Smash," will perform her first musical number on the show: "September Song," which was written for and made popular by her grandfather Walter Huston.
abstract: Anjelica Huston, who plays a Broadway producer on "Smash," will perform her first musical number on the show: "September Song," which was written for and made popular by her grandfather Walter Huston.

headline.main: Anjelica Huston Performs 'September Song' in Her 'Smash' Singing Debut
